isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ 5 Engine Service Manual - Engine Systems - Engine Identification - Engine Systems Interaction Diagram

svcproc.title: Engine Systems Interaction Diagram
svcproc.para: The primary engine systems are air management and fuel management which share some subsystems or have a subsystem that contributes to their operation.

item.para: The electronic control system controls the air management system and fuel management system.
The Coolant System provides heat transfer for crankcase and cylinder sleeves, cylinder head, EGR gases, and lubrication oil.
The lube oil system provides lubrication and heat transfer for engine components.
The Injection Control Pressure (ICP) system uses engine oil to actuate the fuel injectors.
The fuel supply system pressurizes fuel to the fuel injectors.
